title: CCRAS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Research Fellow Post
description: The Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BAMS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the CCRAS Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply and attend the walk-in at the g...
